tutorial.text:
MAHJONGG SOLITAIRE IS A PUZZLE GAME 
    BASED ON A CLASSIC CHINESE GAME. THE GOAL 
   IS TO REMOVE ALL TILES FROM THE BOARD. YOU 
 MAY REMOVE ONLY PAIRED TILES. THE TILE IS 
   FREE WHEN THERE ARE NO TILES EITHER TO THE 
 LEFT OR RIGHT AND ABOVE  IT. NOT EVERY TILE SET 
                        CAN BE FULLY REMOVED.
